name: Nuggie House: Cerberus
description:
Choose a realm of terror; the childish yet vibrant world of Snoocoland, the mundane halls of a high school, or the grand imagining of a wishful mind's dream mansion. Step carefully though, they might hear you.

(Truthfully this is a continuation of a April Fools horror game we made back in 2020, so there's some inside jokes here and there. If there's enough interest we may post that on here.)

Programming

Cheez

Sound Design
phr0o

The Fiends

Jr, Beh, and Liam

Snooco

Trist
